name: svelte-react-jquery
description: Comparison between Svelte, React, and jQuery

scripts.postinstall: (cd jquery && npm install) && (cd svelte && npm install) && (cd react-app && npm install)
scripts.start: concurrently "cd react-app && npm start" "cd svelte && npm run dev -- --port 3001 --open" "cd jquery && npm start -- --port 3002 --open"

author: Jesse Richman
